game.name: Gravity Jump
game.shortDescription: Gravity Jump - the meaning of the game is to control the flight of the blue cube, which continuously moves between the red cubes. When faced with them is the end of the game.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Gravity Jump - the meaning of the game is to control the flight of the blue cube, which continuously moves between the red cubes. When faced with them is the end of the game.

reviewHighlights.text: I hate this game. The constant smacking of the space bar to steer the thing is irritating, plus it seems to move inconsistently. If there is something...
